segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water is flooding out of the sink right behind her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it splashing everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is a mess, and her shoe's wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets are getting ruined with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now look at the kids; they're raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's leaning back, and he's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is just egging him on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; someone needs to stop them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice day outside, but in here it's mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole place will be flooded soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
